cells.data: -- levelNodes :: Tree a -> [[Tree a]]on levelNodes(tree)	script p		on |λ|(xs)			length of xs < 1		end |λ|	end script		script f		on |λ|(xs)			script nest				on |λ|(Node)					nest of Node				end |λ|			end script			concatMap(nest, xs)		end |λ|	end script		iterateUntil(p, f, {tree})end levelNodes
